Configuration The path and name of the configuration file (if any) associated with the selected project or project database. You cannot edit the configuration file associated with the project or project database from this dialog box.
Access Database The path and name of the access control database (if any) associated with the selected project or project database. You cannot edit the access control database associated with the project or project database from this dialog box.
Login Sources The login sources (if any) associated with the selected project or project database. You cannot edit the login sources associated with the project from this dialog box.
